channel.title: Blog on FirePlace
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on FirePlace

item.title: How Much Do Your Bad Habits Really Cost?
item.description: When I was in grad school, I loved going to a coffee shop, ordering an espresso drink, and camping out for a few hours of studying.

item.title: How to Calculate Your FIRE Number
item.description: Calculating your FIRE number is a critical first step in developing your strategy for retiring early.

item.title: Inflation Adjusted S&P 500 Returns for the Last 100 Years
item.description: The S and P 500 has had a lot of ups and downs over the past 100 years.

item.title: A Random Walk with FIRE
item.description: What is FIRE? FIRE stands for Financial Independence Retire Early and is a personal finance philosophy focused on investing aggressively when you're young and living off the gains well before typical retirement years.
